meanings.definition: A sweet, chewy candy made from the root of the licorice plant.
meanings.sent1: I bought some licorices at the store for a tasty treat.
meanings.sent2: The licorices were a popular choice at the candy shop.
meanings.sent3: The licorices jumped out of the jar and started dancing around the room!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a bag of licorices, sweet and infectious.
meanings.sent5: The licorices melted in my mouth, releasing their sugary goodness.

meanings.definition: The flavor or extract of the licorice plant used in cooking and medicine.
meanings.sent1: The recipe called for a hint of licorices to enhance the dish.
meanings.sent2: The licorices added a unique taste to the herbal tea.
meanings.sent3: The licorices in the soup whispered secret flavors to each other.
meanings.sent4: His words were as soothing as a spoonful of licorices in hot water.
meanings.sent5: The licorices infused the potion with a magical essence.
